collection.description: The collection ID, relative to database. For example: chatrooms or chatrooms/my-document/private-messages.

database.description: The Firestore database id. Defaults to '"(default)"'.

document_id.description: The client-assigned document ID to use for this document during creation.

fields.description: The document's [fields](https://cloud.google.com/firestore/docs/reference/rest/v1/projects.databases.documents) formated as a json string.

name.description: A server defined name for this document. Format: 'projects/{{project_id}}/databases/{{database_id}}/documents/{{path}}/{{document_id}}'

path.description: A relative path to the collection this document exists within

update_time.description: Last update timestamp in RFC3339 format.
